Title: Allows police vehicles to have one or more forward facing blue lights
Summary: Allows police vehicles to have one or more forward facing blue lights, provided that such blue light can only be displayed in combination with a red and/or white light.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to allowing police vehicles to have one or more forward facing blue lights
